TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit ArraySegment`1<T> extends System.ValueType implements class System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1<!T>, class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<!T>, class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<!T>, class System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyCollection`1<!T>, class System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyList`1<!T>, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
Public Structure ArraySegment(Of T) Implements ICollection(Of T), IEnumerable(Of T), IList(Of T), IReadOnlyCollection(Of T), IReadOnlyList(Of T)

generic <typename T> public value class ArraySegment : System::Collections::Generic::ICollection<T>, System::Collections::Generic::IEnumerable<T>, System::Collections::Generic::IList<T>, System::Collections::Generic::IReadOnlyCollection<T>, System::Collections::Generic::IReadOnlyList<T>
type ArraySegment<'T> = struct interface IList<'T> interface IReadOnlyList<'T> interface ICollection<'T> interface seq<'T> interface IEnumerable interface IReadOnlyCollection<'T>

span.span: The type of the elements in the array segment.

summary.span: 分隔一维数组的一部分。

span.span: Delimits a section of a one-dimensional array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一个数组，其中分隔的一系列该数组中元素周围的包装器。 is a wrapper around an array that delimits a range of elements in that array. 多个实例可以引用同一个原始数组和可以重叠。Multiple instances can refer to the same original array and can overlap. 原始数组必须是一维，并且必须具有从零开始的索引。The original array must be one-dimensional and must have zero-based indexing. > [!NOTE] > 实现开头的接口[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]; 在以前版本的.NET Framework 中，结构未实现此接口。 implements the interface starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]; in previous versions of the .NET Framework, the structure did not implement this interface. 结构非常有用，只要将非重复的段中操作数组的元素。The structure is useful whenever the elements of an array will be manipulated in distinct segments. 例如:For example: - 可以将传递对象，表示只有部分数组作为参数的方法，而不是代价相对较大方法的调用传递数组的一部分的副本。You can pass an object that represents only a portion of an array as an argument to a method, rather than call a relatively expensive method like to pass a copy of a portion of an array. - 在多线程应用中，可以使用结构，让它对只有部分数组的每个线程。In a multithreaded app, you can use the structure to have each thread operate on only a portion of the array. - 对于基于任务的异步操作，可以使用对象，以确保每个任务作用于数组的不同段。For task-based asynchronous operations, you can use an object to ensure that each task operates on a distinct segment of the array. 下面的示例将划分为各个段具有最多十个元素的数组。The following example divides an array into individual segments with up to ten elements. 在段中的每个元素乘以其段数量。Each element in the segment is multiplied by its segment number. 结果显示，使用类来处理这种方式中的元素会更改其基础数组值。The result shows that using the class to manipulate elements in this way changes the values of its underlying array. [!code-csharp[System.ArraySegment#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.ArraySegment/CS/segmentexample.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.ArraySegment#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.ArraySegment/VB/segmentexample.vb#2)] 但请注意，尽管结构可用于将数组划分为不同的段、 的段不是完全独立于另一个。Note, however, that although the structure can be used to divide an array into distinct segments, the segments are not completely independent of one another. 属性返回整个原始数组不是数组的副本; 因此，对所做更改返回的数组属性对原始数组。The property returns the entire original array, not a copy of the array; therefore, changes made to the array returned by the property are made to the original array. 如果这是不可取，您应执行副本操作的数组，而不是对象，表示数组的一部分。If this is undesirable, you should perform operations on a copy of the array, rather than an object that represents a portion of the array. 引用相等性时它们比较两个测试方法和相等和不相等运算符对象。The method and the equality and inequality operators test for reference equality when they compare two objects. 两个对象被视为相等，它们必须满足所有以下条件：For two objects to be considered equal, they must meet all of the following conditions: - 引用相同的数组。Reference the same array. - 在数组中的相同索引处开始。Begin at the same index in the array. - 具有相同数量的元素。Have the same number of elements. 如果你想要检索其索引的元素对象，您必须将其转换为对象并对其进行检索或修改它通过使用属性。If you want to retrieve an element by its index in the object, you must cast it to an object and retrieve it or modify it by using the property. 下面的示例检索中的元素分隔的字符串数组的一部分的对象。The following example retrieves the element in an object that delimits a section of a string array. [!code-csharp[System.ArraySegment.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.arraysegment.class/cs/example1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.ArraySegment.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.arraysegment.class/vb/example1.vb#1)] ## Examples 下面的代码示例传递结构的方法。The following code example passes an structure to a method. [!code-cpp[System.ArraySegment#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.ArraySegment/CPP/arraysegment.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.ArraySegment#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.ArraySegment/CS/arraysegment.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.ArraySegment#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.ArraySegment/VB/arraysegment.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 结构的新实例，该结构用于分隔指定数组中的所有元素。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the structure that delimits all the elements in the specified array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数创建分隔的所有元素`array`。This constructor creates an that delimits all the elements of `array`. 即的属性为 0 并将其属性的长度为`array`。That is, the property of the is 0 and its property is the length of `array`. 若要创建分隔仅某个数组的一部分，请使用构造函数。To create an that delimits only part of an array, use the constructor. 原始数组必须是一维，并且必须具有从零开始的索引。The original array must be one-dimensional and must have zero-based indexing. 多个实例可以引用同一个原始数组和可以重叠。Multiple instances can refer to the same original array and can overlap. ## Examples 下面的代码示例传递结构的方法。The following code example passes an structure to a method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 两个对象被视为相等，如果满足以下所有条件：Two objects are considered to be equal if all the following conditions are met: - 它们引用相同的数组。They reference the same array. - 它们在数组中的相同索引处开始。They begin at the same index in the array. - 它们具有相同的元素数。They have the same number of elements.

summary.span: 返回循环访问数组段的枚举器。

span.span: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the array segment.
